isis.stitle: AIR COMPRESSOR: BENDIX TU-FLO 501 - MAINTENANCE - OPERATION TESTS

svcproc.title: OPERATION TESTS
svcproc.para: Vehicles manufactured after the effective date of FMVSS 121, with the minimum required reservoir volume, must have a compressor capable of raising air system pressure from 85 to 100 psi in 25 seconds or less, with the engine operating at maximum governed speed. The vehicle must be certified of this performance on new vehicles with all allowances for air systems with greater than minimum required reservoir volume.
